description: The user �first accessess the '�File a Bug' page.  boo
instructions:
1. Launch Bugzilla Lite app
2. Tap '+' to file a bug
    >> The pop up will display only the first time the user views the ‘File a Bug’ page.
    >> Please check all strings of the pop up window. (BugzillaLite_IxD.pdf, page 16)

description: User can successfully log out from Bugzilla Lite app boo
id: Log out from Bugzilla Lite app
Check all strings for Login Errors and Network Error
instructions:
1. Launch Bugzilla Lite app and login with wrong username and password 
    >> Login Errors
    >> Please check all strings. (BugzillaLite_Ixd.pdf, page 15)
2. Disconnect your Network
3. Login to Bugzilla Lite app again
    >> Network Error
    >> Please check all strings. (BugzillaLite_Ixd.pdf, page 15)

description:
After pressing hardware key (volume up+down) to submit bug will redirect to login page. 

Prereq: NOT login to Bugzilla Lite app boo
instructions:
1. Long press the hardware key(volume up+down) to capture log
2. Drag down Notifcations 
3. Tap 'Device logs saved'
     >> Options include: Bugzilla Lite, E-Mail and Cancel
4. Select the 'Bugzilla Lite' button
5. Tap 'Attach' 
6. Fill out title and description fields 
7. Tap 'Submit' 
    >> It will redrect to login page
8. Enter Login information 
    >> Successfully submit a bug 
    >> Navigate to the bug page once a bug is submitted
